name: Aganorsa Leaf - Rare Leaf Reserve - Lonsdale
additionalNotes: Aganorsa Rare Leaf Reserve cigars are rolled under the strictest of old-world standards using nothing, but the finest vintage Nicaraguan tobaccos all grown on the famed Aganorsa farms throughout the country. This estate grown blend includes a gorgeous mocha brown café wrapper leaf from Jalapa surrounding a double Nicaraguan binder and long filler tobaccos that consists of rare, reserved Criollo 98 and Criollo 99 tobaccos from two prized vintage years. Rare Leaf Reserve displays the luxurious complexity of Aganorsa tobaccos by providing the discerning cigar enthusiast with a medium bodied mix of mouthwatering flavors that includes sweet spice, cinnamon, earth, cocoa, and leather. Available in three popular big ring sizes; a 5 x52 Robusto, 6 x54 Toro, and a 6 x60 Titan.
